sb.model

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • sb.model.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvancedTileBoardModel

    public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvancedTileBoardModel
    The model of the sokobencho game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int curLevelIndex
      The number of the currently loaded level from the list
      private ButtonDoorGroupManager doorManager
      The door manager is used to open and close doors
      private int levelHeight
      Actual height of the level
      (package private) java.util.List<java.net.URL> levels
      A ordered list of levelfile paths
      private int levelWidth
      Actual width of the level
      private Tile[][] map
      This array of tiles represents one level
      private int MAX_COLS
      Upper limit of columns a level can have

      Upper limit of rows a level can have
      private java.lang.String message
      A message for the player
      private java.util.LinkedList<Event> moveableEvents
      A list of events containing information about movements of moveables.
      private Player player
      The one and only player controllable object
      private java.util.Map<Vector,Pushable> pushables
      All pushables of this level mapped onto their positions
      private java.util.List<Target> targets
      A list of all targets that have to be filled by boxes in order to finish this level
      private java.util.List<AdvancedTileBoardView> views
      A list of attached views to display the game

      • initLevelList

        private java.util.List<java.net.URL> initLevelList()
        Loads the level list from the resources and extracts the level paths.
        Returns:
        A list of URLs to the level files in playing order

      • loadLevel

        private void loadLevel(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.io.InputStream stream)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Load a new level from file into this model. The file must contain a rectangular 2D-representation of the map.
        Parameters:
        stream - InputStream of the file to load
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • nextLevel

        public void nextLevel()
        Load the next level from the level list. End the game if there is no level left or if there was an error:
        1. If the finished level was the last one, broadcast this info.
        2. If this method is called again afterwards, broadcast quit signal.
        Specified by:
        nextLevel in interface AdvancedTileBoardModel
